enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding multiple DeferredChanged items to a list, which is a prerequisite for the build method.
The whenSet method initializes consumers that are later used in the build method to set values.
Both methods return a DeferredChanged object, which can be used to assert similar outcomes in tests.
The isFull method is used internally within the build method to check if all values are set, which can be used to assert the state of the build process.
